content.html: I reiterate: fuck you if you support or are neutral towards Musk. This is a WILDLY unsurprising outcome, and your lack of care for his hate speech around trans identity in the past has enabled this.

I reiterate: fuck you if you support or are neutral towards Musk. 

This is a WILDLY unsurprising outcome, and your lack of care for his hate speech around trans identity in the past has enabled this.
